Berlinda Addardey, onye a maara nke oma dị ka Berla Mundi, (amụrụ na abali mbu nke onwa  Eprel 1988) bụ onye mgbasa ozi  si mba  Ghana, onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-eji olu ya aguputa ihe n' uzo puru iche Ya na Kwami Sefa Kayi kwadoro VGMA nke iri abụọ.
Berla bụ onye guchara akwukwo nke St
Theresa's School, Achimota School na Mahadum nke Ghana ebe ọ gụrụ asụsụ na akparamaagwa maka akara ugo mmụta nke  mbụ ya.
Ọ gụrụ French na Alliance Francais
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ na ulo akwukwo nta akuko di na  Ghana,
Ọ malitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nke abụọ na asọmpi ịma mma Miss Maliaka nke afọ 2010. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na GHOne TV onye enyemaka   EIB Network ruo afọ ise
Ọ nọ ugbu a na TV3 Ghana bụ onye enyemaka nke Media General Ghana Limited. Berla kwadoro ihe ngosi na ihe omume ụlọ ọrụ. Ọ na-akwado ihe ngosi mbụ nke Africa na DSTV, Moment with MO
Avance Media ghọtara ya dị ka onye Ghana kachasị nwee mmetụta na 2017. N'afọ 2017, o meriri na ihe nrite onye nta akuko kachasi nwee  njike  na Glitz Style Awards nke Claudia Lumor hiwere.
A maara Mundi maka nkwado ya maka ụmụ agbọghọ na ikike ụmụ nwanyị. Ọ malitere ọrụ ndụmọdụ na nduzi ọrụ n'afọ 2018. Ebumnuche ya bụ inye ụmụ agbọghọ ọzụzụ nkà.
O guzobere ntọala Berla Mundi na 2015. Na June 2019, e gosipụtara Mundi na Visual Collaborative electronic catalog, n'okpuru usoro Polaris. Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere ọrụ buru onwegi
